name: KookySphere
description:
kooky sphere is a game made for dream dairy 5 you explore the dreams of rose. 
controls 

WASD to move around.
Press the enter key when near the bed in order to go to the nexus.
press z to open the effects menu 
press the space bar to open the pause menu
